Detailed Description

Downloads SRTM data from NASA's server.

QString  cachedir 
)

Constructor for SrtmDownloader.

Note:
This downloader currently only supports SRTM3 data.
Parameters:
urlURL to the SRTM data.
cachedirDirectory in which the downloaded files are stored.

void SrtmDownloader::downloadTile ( QString  filename)

Download a tile from the server.

Parameters:
filenamemust be in the format continent/tilename.hgt.zip
Note:
You should _not_ call this function when you need tile data. Use getTile instead.

SrtmTile * SrtmDownloader::getTile ( float  lat,
float  lon 
)

Get tile for a specified location.

Note:
The tile object returned is owned by this SrtmDownloader instance. It _must_ _not_ be deleted by the user. However it _may_ be deleted by SrtmDownloader during any later call to getTile()
